alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Keith; Lincoln; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 8:17AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Arthur, northeastern Keith, northwestern Lincoln and McPherson Counties through 900 AM CDT/800 AM MDT/... At 817 AM CDT/717 AM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles east of Swan Lake to 18 miles north of Sarben to near Keystone. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Keystone, Big Bald Hill, Bucktail Lake, Sand Beach Lake, Flatts, Big Lamunyon Flats, Diamond Bar Lake, Bucktail, Nevens, Broganville, Schnick Lake and Calora. This includes the following highways... Highway 92 between mile markers 174 and 203. Highway 97 between mile markers 32 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
